EmailTemplate.name: Agreement O365 Review Completion Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Review for {!Apttus__DocumentVersionDetail__c.Apttus__Title__c} has been completed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Reviewer,
Thank you for completing the review of {!Apttus__DocumentVersionDetail__c.Apttus__Title__c}.
You no longer have access to the document requested for review.
Thanks, Conga CLM
